snippet.description: ( ′mid·əl′shmerts ) (medicine) Pain or discomfort in the lower abdomen in women occurring midway in the intermenstrual interval, thought to be secondary to the irritation of the pelvic peritoneum by fluid or blood escaping from the point of... More »

snippet.description: I have mittelschmerz and it is pain during the middle of your cycle....when you ovulate. I went to the ER not knowing what else to do....I tried a heating pad and OTC (over the counter) pain killers. Nothing helped but the day after I went ... More »

snippet.title: Mittelschmerz (Painful Ovulation) - Cleveland Clinic
snippet.description: Mittelschmerz is the pelvic pain that some women experience during ovulation. Ovulation generally occurs about midway between menstrual cycles; hence the ...

snippet.title: Sexual Health: Painful Ovulation (Mittelschmerz) - WebMD
snippet.description: Aug 22, 2012 ... Mittelschmerz is the pelvic and lower abdominal pain that some women experience during ovulation. Ovulation generally occurs about midway ...

snippet.title: Mittelschmerz: MedlinePlus Medical Encyclopedia
snippet.description: Causes. About 1 in 5 women have pain around the time of ovulation. This is called mittelschmerz. The pain may occur just before, during, or after ovulation.

snippet.title: Mittelschmerz Definition - Diseases and Conditions - Mayo Clinic
snippet.description: Mittelschmerz — Comprehensive overview covers symptoms, causes, treatment of abdominal pain during ovulation.
